title: Asking about frequent flyer mileage
context: Ask if your flight qualifies for reward points or miles.

content.bestLine: Does this flight qualify for reward points or miles?

neutral.text: Is this flight eligible for miles?
Can I earn points on this flight?
Does this flight count towards my mileage?
Am I eligible for reward miles on this flight?
Will I earn frequent flyer miles on this flight?
Is this flight part of the mileage program?
Can I accumulate points on this flight?
Does my ticket qualify for mileage rewards?

informal.text: Do I get miles for this flight?
Can I score some points on this trip?
Is this flight gonna give me some miles?
Will this flight add to my mileage total?
Do I earn rewards on this flight?
Can I rack up some points on this flight?
Is there a mileage bonus for this flight?
Will I get some frequent flyer love on this trip?

formal.text: I would like to inquire about mileage eligibility for this flight.
Could you please inform me if this flight qualifies for reward miles?
I am interested in knowing if this flight is part of the frequent flyer program.
Will this flight be credited towards my mileage account?
I would appreciate it if you could tell me if this flight earns mileage rewards.
Is it possible to earn points on this flight as part of the loyalty program?

dialogs.description: Asking about mileage eligibility at check-in

lines.speaker: Passenger
lines.text: Does this flight qualify for reward points or miles?

lines.speaker: Agent
lines.text: Yes, this flight is eligible for mileage rewards. I can help you credit the miles to your account.

dialogs.description: Inquiring about mileage accumulation during booking

lines.speaker: Traveler
lines.text: Will I earn frequent flyer miles on this flight?

lines.speaker: Booking Agent
lines.text: Yes, you will earn miles on this flight. Would you like me to add your loyalty program number to the booking?
